name: Hypostatize
description:
Short VR puzzle game (10 minutes) made to explore some computer graphics in VR like stencil buffers and different shaders. This was made in 1 week. The game plays with perception and optical illusions.  I hope you enjoy.

If you do not have an VR equipment, you can watch the whole gameplay here:

All the assets were takan from Unity Asset Store and the sound effects from freesound.org
